CustomField.description: Ticked if the client has : - a To-do not received from DREAM with action type equals to Email, Phone, SMS or Mobile Chat in the last 30 days - an Appointment in the last 30 days
CustomField.formula:
OR (
IF(LastContactDate__c >=
IF( MONTH(TODAY()) = 1, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 12, 01), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 1, 01) ),
true,
false),
IF(LastAppointmentDate__c >=
IF( MONTH(TODAY()) = 1, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 12, 01), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 1, 01) ),
true,
false) )
CustomField.label: Contacted in the last 30 days
